name: Color Clock - Impossible Wheel
description:
--- INTRO ---
Color Clocks 2k17 in really new and fantastic game idea.
It very addictive game. Multiple levels are available here with different clocks.

---WHY YOU SHOULD CHOOSE IT?---

-->A lot of Challenging Puzzles!
-->Exquisite Game Interface!
-->Cool Animation Effects!
-->Download for Free!
-->Applicable to Any Ages!
-->Applies to All iPhone Devices or AppleStore Users!
-->Any time at Any Place!
--> Get high score and compare with your friend through Leaderboard.

--- HOW TO PLAY ---

Clock will rotate and will and should tap when the clock direction is pointing to another clock direction.
Try to finish all clock before time ends.
